channel.title: Comments on: Links for Mon 4 Feb 2008

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Ben -
Nice idea, especially for sites that allow users to register. In my case I just wanted to highlight my own comments.
item.content:encoded:
@Ben –

Nice idea, especially for sites that allow users to register. In my case I just wanted to highlight my own comments.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description:
Found your website because I am very interested in Prologue - nice job :)
Commenting on this post because <a href="http://www.binarymoon.co.uk/2008/01/bm-comment-highlight-guide/" rel="nofollow">I recently released a plugin</a> that takes care of user classes in comments and makes it super easy to style different users comments in different ways. Would be great to get some feedback from an Automattic employee :)
